CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Families relative to Elderly Population?
SRP.A: Families is {above} Elderly Population in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Rural Communities}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Elderly Population}.

VE.Q: What is Young Adults's Technology Adoption Rate in 2015?
VE.A: Young Adults's technology adoption rate in 2015 is {24.82} %.

VE.Q: What is Young Adults's Technology Adoption Rate in 2006?
VE.A: Young Adults's technology adoption rate in 2006 is {23.52} %.

VE.Q: What is Students's Technology Adoption Rate in 2017?
VE.A: Students's technology adoption rate in 2017 is {4.13} %.

VE.Q: What are the technology adoption rate of Elderly Population, Families, and Working Professionals in 2004?
VE.A: Elderly Population's technology adoption rate is {19.53} %, Families's technology adoption rate is {20.33} %, Working Professionals's technology adoption rate is {20.33} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Technology Adoption Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum technology adoption rate is {4.13} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Technology Adoption Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum technology adoption rate is {41.36} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Technology Adoption Rate level recorded for Elderly Population?
What is the lowest Technology Adoption Rate level recorded for Elderly Population?
EVJ.A: Elderly Population's lowest recorded level is approximately {5.66} % in {2016}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Technology Adoption Rate?
SC.A: The average total technology adoption rate is {122.60} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate fall between 115.28 and 127.42 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate exceed 126.39 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate go below 116.31 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2017, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 2007 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between 2006 and 2017 was {lower} than between 2007 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2013, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 2004 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between 2006 and 2013 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2014.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2012, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 2007 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between 2005 and 2012 was {higher} than between 2007 and 2014.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2014, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2016?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 2013 and 2014 was {smaller} than between 2009 and 2016.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Rural Communities} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Students, Families, Elderly Population, Urban Dwellers, Working Professionals, Young Adults, Rural Communities}.
